movies.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
movies.plot: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1974.

events.title: five men break into DNC headquarters at the Watergate Complex

movies.title: Game Change
movies.plot: During the Republican run of the 2008 Presidential election, candidate John McCain picks a relative unknown, Alaskan governor Sarah Palin, to be his running mate.  As the campaign kicks into high gear, her lack of experience, in both political and media savvy, becomes a drain upon McCain and his strategists.
movies.awards: Won 3 Golden Globes. Another 28 wins & 39 nominations.

events.title: John McCain announces that Sarah Palin will be his running mate
Sarah Palin gives her acceptance speech
Barack Obama wins the presidential election

movies.title: The Polar Express
movies.plot: When a doubting young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery that shows him that the wonder of life never fades for those who believe.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 23 nominations.

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.plot: Chuck Nolan, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 35 nominations.

events.title: Chuck Noland's plane crashes and he washes up on a desert island
